original_text: But the one who did not know, and did what deserved a beating, will receive a light beating. Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.
korean_text: 알지 못하고 맞을 일을 행한 종은 적게 맞으리라 무릇 많이 받은 자에게는 많이 요구할 것이요 많이 맡은 자에게는 많이 달라 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But the one who did not know
and did what deserved a beating
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 마땅히 매를 맞을 일을 했더라도

sentences.original_text: Everyone to whom much was given
of him much will be required
and from him to whom they entrusted much
